description: KL-49 is the Sub Regional Transport Office (Joint RTO) based in Adimaly, serving the high-altitude regions of Idukki district. This office is crucial for managing vehicle registrations and licensing in a major tourism and plantation hub, including areas like Munnar.
address: Sub Regional Transport Office, 1st Floor, Grama Panchayat Building, Adimaly, Idukki, Kerala
